messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom) The Archers
messages.msgSnippet: ... OMG!! Are the Archers still on the radio!?!? I haven t heard them since I left UK 30yrs ago!! Marianne - who lurks a lot

OMG!! Are the Archers still on the radio!?!?
I haven't heard them since I left UK 30yrs ago!!
Marianne - who lurks a lot

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom) The Archers
messages.msgSnippet: ... married to an ... edition for me ... miss ... too young ... LOL  I don t think I m too young just that I don t listen, not part of my habits...  All the
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., NumoAstro@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 9/21/01 7:12:22 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
> Unschooling-dotcom@y... writes:

> I really wish I could get the Archers over here. When I was
married to an
> English guy (1st time around) his mum would tape the Omnibus
edition for me
> and when she had about 6 weeks worth would mail them too me. I
miss
> listening to them so much. Do you ever listen to them or are you
too young
> Tracey?
>

LOL I don't think I'm 'too young' just that I don't listen, not part
of my habits... All the national BBC stations are on webcast,
http://www.bbc.co.uk/radio

Tracy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom) The Archers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/21/01 7:12:22 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... I really wish I could get the Archers over here.  When I was married to an English guy
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/21/01 7:12:22 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> , it was a radio
> show b4 being books or telly, and they're currently
> repeating it on BBC Radio4. The series is a few
> episodes in now :-( They may have it in archives or be
> repeating it another time, www.bbc.co.uk is the main
> BBC addy... Tracey
>

I really wish I could get the Archers over here. When I was married to an
English guy (1st time around) his mum would tape the Omnibus edition for me
and when she had about 6 weeks worth would mail them too me. I miss
listening to them so much. Do you ever listen to them or are you too young
Tracey?

Dawn
Hey just had an idea... maybe you could tape them for me <g>
